Sentencas: Thermal cycling of planar solid oxide cell (SOC) stacks can lead to failure due to thermal stresses arising from differences in thermal expansion of the stack's materials.
Titulo: Improving the interface adherence at sealings in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: The interfaces between the cell, interconnect, and sealing are particularly critical.
Titulo: Improving the interface adherence at sealings in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: Hence, understanding possible failure mechanisms at the interfaces and developing robust sealing concepts are important for stack reliability.
Titulo: Improving the interface adherence at sealings in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: In this work, the mechanical performance of interfaces in the sealing region of SOC stacks is studied.
Titulo: Improving the interface adherence at sealings in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: Joints comprising Crofer22APU (preoxidized or coated with MnCo2O4 or Al2O3) are sealed using V11 glass.
Titulo: Improving the interface adherence at sealings in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: The fracture energy of the joints is measured, and the fractured interfaces are analyzed using microscopy.
Titulo: Improving the interface adherence at sealings in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: The results show that choosing the right coating solution would increase the fracture energy of the sealing area by more than 70%.
Titulo: Improving the interface adherence at sealings in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: We demonstrate that the test methodology could also be used to test the adhesion of thin coatings on metallic substrates.
Titulo: Improving the interface adherence at sealings in solid oxide cell stacks
